# EntityURLRepresentation

**Structure**

The URL representation of an app entity.

## Declaration

```swift
struct EntityURLRepresentation<Entity> where Entity : AppEntity
```

## Overview

Note that you need to use a universal link for your URL representation, you can’t use a custom URL scheme. For more information about universal links, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Xcode/allowing-apps-and-websites-to-link-to-your-content].

## Initializers

- **init(_:)**

## Conforms To

- ExpressibleByExtendedGraphemeClusterLiteral
- ExpressibleByStringInterpolation
- ExpressibleByStringLiteral
- ExpressibleByUnicodeScalarLiteral
